website_summaries.verdict: An intricate kit that allows skilled modelers to grow their collection on a budget.
pros: A stimulating kit modeled after the plucky and charming 1972 Ford Bronco
This option from Revell looks realistic and features a detailed 289-cubic-inch engine, a swing-away spare tire, and a removable hardtop
Includes 137 pieces in total for moderate difficulty
cons: This model does not come painted

customer_reviews.title: A Satisfying Build
customer_reviews.text: This model went exceptionally well. The parts were clean with very little flash and fit together well. The instructions are clear and concise with one or two minor exceptions but it was easy enough to figure out. The only real complaint that I have is that the roof is warped and will not sit straight on the body without being altered or glued. However, this will happen from time to time. It's usually not a manufacturing error. Overall, I am very happy with this model. I spent approximately 20 hours on this build and pretty much went for the box front look.
customer_reviews.author: Gambler D Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Many good memories!
customer_reviews.text: I used to build a lot of Revell models when I was a kid so when I saw this particular model I had to buy it. We had one just like this as our primary vehicle when we first got married. We took it camping, skiing, and everywhere else we went. Many happy memories. By the way, the directions are good but you must paint the parts first then remove the paint before gluing. Basic but often overlooked.
customer_reviews.author: bobwhite

customer_reviews.title: Fun project.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, and they have been having fun putting it together! They painted all the little parts and the body of the car with acrylic paint. It’s been a fun project if your stuck at home and enjoy cars.
customer_reviews.author: JandD

customer_reviews.title: The authenticity is also amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This little project is quite the challenge. It is more than worth it for the old Bronco owner. The authenticity is also amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Human Backpack

customer_reviews.title: An
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas! He has a Bronco just like this model! He loves it and has totally enjoyed putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty crappy material which is surprising about revelle, they really are good with models cars, but this one was a positive. I rate the kitchen, a 1 star due to it snapping in half

customer_reviews.title: The universe..has a sense of humor
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on 27 April...the following Tuesday, I’m chatting with a Friend & 2 of her boys after lax game...a real-life-Exact-Same-as-box-art Bronco rolls past! The boys (15 yr old twins) were like, “Mom! You should get one for us!” Kit is delivered 4 May, I show her pic of the box (above). I’m hoping she’s not thinking stalker-dude went home & ordered it off amazon! Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Revell Ford Bronco Plastic Model Kit
product_meta.description: This is the 1/25 scale Ford Bronco plastic model kit. Suitable for ages 14 and up. Features: highly detailed pieces molded in white and clear chrome plated parts and soft black tires Detailed 289 cu. In. Engine swing-a-way spare tireremoveable hard top water slide decals illustrated instructions Includes: one plastic model requirements: assembly hobby knife cement for plastics sprue cutters paint (aluminum, dark blue, flat black, gloss light blue, red, semi-gloss black, semi-gloss white, Silver, steel, transparent red, turn signal Amber, specifications: scale: 1/25Length: 6-3/8in (161.95Mm)width: 2-3/4in (69.85Mm)height: 2-13/16in (71.43Mm)skill level: 5parts: 137
feature_bullets: Challenge yourself to construct this 137-piece model kit
This kit features detailed 289 coin. Engine, swing-a-way Spare tire, and removable hardtop
This 1: 25 scale model is molded in white and clear with chrome plated parts and soft black tires.
Recommended for ages 14 years and up. Required paint, glue, and tools sold separately.
Recommended paint: aluminum, D Blue, flat black, gloss let blue, red, semi gloss black, semi gloss white, silver, steel, Trans. Red, turn signal Amber, yellow
